name: Humble
description: A mobile app where you can get together and humble each other. Post a selfie and the comment with the best roast wins imaginary points.

name: Star Wars Expanded Universe App
description: An app for Star Wars fans where can explore the stories and world of the expanded Univser, pre-Disney era. Funding will also support the future law suit that we will face once Mickey discovers this app.

name: BTC Flip
description: A game for Windows and macOS where players can invest in the crypto market, but the app will make the decision for you with a coinflip! Heads you buy, tails you sell!
